## Slidedecks and Project Collections

On this github page, I collect my slidedecks and project information collections as a knowledge hub for myself. 

While you are welcome to look at this page, please note that the materials uploaded here are not edited to provide stand-alone insights into projects without context, and if you stumbled on here on accident, they might be a bit confusing. 

All materials displayed on this website are my own and do not contain private, sensitive or confidential information.
